qas.question: What is Oakland Counties rank in affluence in 2009?
What is Oakland Counties average income?
What is Wayne Counties average income?

context: Oakland County in Metro Detroit, once rated amongst the wealthiest US counties per household, is no longer shown in the top 25 listing of Forbes magazine. But internal county statistical methods – based on measuring per capita income for counties with more than one million residents – show that Oakland is still within the top 12, slipping from the 4th-most affluent such county in the U.S. in 2004 to <a0_0>11th<a0_0/>-most affluent in 2009. <a1_0>Detroit<a1_0/> dominates Wayne County, which has an average household income of about <a3_0>$38,000<a3_0/>, compared to Oakland County's <a2_0>$62,000<a2_0/>.
